Consts

cattagCssIndent {.intdefine.}: int = 4
cattagHtmlGenerateEmptyAttributeValue {.booldefine.} = false
Toggles if <script defer="">...</script> should be generated instead of <script defer>...</script> for HTML 
cattagHtmlTrailingSlash {.booldefine.} = true
Toggles if br should generate <br /> instead of <br> 
cattagHtmlXmlAttributeQuote {.strdefine.} = "\'"
Quote used for attribute values (" or ') 
cattagHtmlXmlIndent {.intdefine.} = 4
Sets indent for children (if set to zero, output will be inline) 
cattagHtmlXmlSortAttributes {.booldefine.} = true
Toggles alphabetical sorting of attributes 
cattagOutputDirectory {.strdefine.}: string = "."
Defines the output directory for HTML, XML and CSS files 
cattagXmlSelfCloseOnEmptyChildren {.booldefine.} = true
Toggles if no children will generate <some-text /> instead of <some-text></some-text> (good practice for XML)
